content.title: Add Constants to frmLoginController
content.body:
1. Navigate to Project > Mobile > Controllers, and select frmLoginController.
    The Controller file contains the code that manipulates the data and updates the user interface.
  2. Open the file by clicking it and copy paste the code inside define:

    Usrname: "john.doe@woodburn.com",
    Psword: "VoltMX@123",


    Content of the JS file will look as:

    define({
    Usrname: "john.doe@woodburn.com",
    Psword: "VoltMX@123",
    });
